title: The Bookworm Awakens
description: The addiction began with dog-eared novels and back-of-the-cereal-box copy.

title: First Scribbles, First Wins
description: Won the school magazine contest. Twice. Got paid in applause and free lunch.

title: Words Meet Strategy
description: B.A. in English. M.A. in Marketing. Because words need purpose too.

title: The Copywriter Chronicles Begin
description: Copywriting at Leo Burnett—where briefs met bold ideas.

title: Little Big Wins
description: Won that award. And that intern war. Survived the creative director's red pen.

title: Experiment Central
description: Tried poetry, scripts, UX copy, Instagram captions... nailed some, failed some.

title: Where Art Meets Copy
description: Doodles in margins now live on Instagram. Art fuels ads. Chaos breeds copy.

title: Still Writing the Story…
description: This trail's still growing. Got a story to tell? Let's talk.
